Calculate the actual age between two dates

calc_age.Rd

Calculate the actual age between two dates

calc_age(birth_date, onset_date)

Arguments

birth_date

Birth date.

onset_date

Event date.

Value

Vector of ages.

Examples

sdate <- as.Date("1960-01-01")
edate <- as.Date("1980-12-31")
bdate <- sample(seq(sdate, edate, by = "1 day"), 100, replace = TRUE)
event <- sample(seq(as.Date("2020-01-01"),
                    as.Date("2023-07-08"),
                    by = "1 day"),
                100, replace = TRUE)
ages <- calc_age(bdate, event)
ages
#>   [1] 51 46 51 44 48 58 46 55 51 58 42 49 55 54 57 57 53 45 46 53 42 45 56 53 53
#>  [26] 46 52 50 56 47 41 46 56 54 47 44 47 61 53 61 52 55 57 44 51 39 44 46 53 40
#>  [51] 45 49 42 42 54 48 44 46 47 59 55 58 51 51 52 44 44 57 43 56 54 46 49 46 53
#>  [76] 60 55 59 59 58 49 55 54 48 43 43 45 62 57 43 55 46 58 57 46 54 55 45 44 42
